result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert C Woods was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
-Absolute sobriety.
-No controlled substances or prescription medication unless prescribed by physician and in conformity with said prescription.
-Submit DNA sample.
-Pay supervision fees.

Defendant Robert C Woods in court with attorney Jack Alan Umpleby.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court is informed an amended information will be filed. Court recess. Case recalled at 2:08 pm. All appearances the same. Amended information filed. Defendant enters no contest/alford plea. Court examines defendant, finds him guilty and renders sentence.

State's
w/conditions: defendant is allowed to have contact with father, Robert Woods.  Defendant is allowed to reside with Robert Woods upon release.

w/conditions modified: No contact with minors at defendants residence, Defendant allowed contact with minors as karate instructor at 3 schools, incidental contact with minors at management properties allowed, no controlled substances or prescription medication unless prescribed by physician and in conformity with said prescription.

Defendant Robert C Woods in court with attorney Jack Alan Umpleby.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Umpleby motion for bail modification. Response by District Attorney not objecting to modification as stated. Court will permit defendant to have incidental contact with minors at his management properties. Defendant may have contact with minor children as a karate instructer at 3 area schools. No contact with minors at defendant's residence.
notice of motion and defendant's motion for modification of bail,   Scanned and forwarded to Br. 1
Atty. Umpleby requested a motion to modify bail conditions. Case set for hearing on 1/5/2016 at 3:15 pm. Atty. Umpleby informed he must fax motion to our office as well as District Attorney promptly.
Status hearing at 02-01-2016 01:15 pm

Defendant Robert C Woods in court with attorney Jack Alan Umpleby.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Umpleby stated he was recently appointed, this is his first appearance. Atty. Umpleby requests status date, continues waives time limits. Bail to continue.  Status hearing scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
w/conditions:  no controlled subst/prescrip medic unless prescribed; no contact with any minors or have in residence.

Defendant Robert C Woods appearing by video conferencing from the Ozaukee County Jail and with attorney Jamie Marie Mcclendon.  Defendant in custody. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of the penalties.  Counsel advises defendant may be retaining private counsel.  State requesting $500 cash bail w/conditions.  Court examines defendant on right to preliminary hearing.  Defendant requesting status hearing to obtain counsel.  Court finds good cause to extend timelimits.  Status hearing scheduled for December 22, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
